This is a sample blog post. It's a great example of a few of bsw's most powerful features:

  • Multiple templates (a specific "blog" template)
  • Templating with page vars

It's actually just like any other page - bsw doesn't have any blog specific functionality. However by using the simple templating system you can easily create custom page types.

Check out the page markup in pages/blog/... and have a look at the template in templates/blog.html to see how easy it is to work with.
